EmailTemplate.name: Customer Service: Encouraging to Call Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower – The Most Powerful Solar: Web Inquiry Response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear (Customer’s Full Name),
Thank you for your interest in SunPower. Thousands of homeowners worldwide, like you, are turning to SunPower for their solar needs.
We are sending you this email in response to the web inquiry you sent.
Please give us a call at the SunPower Customer Care line (1-800-SUNPOWER or 1-800-7867693) to complete your information. Otherwise, please answer the following questions for us to be able to connect you with a certified Premier Partner in your area:
1. Please provide the complete physical address (with zip code) of the home where you plan to install a SunPower system. 2. What is your motivation to go solar? 3. How much is your average monthly electric bill (excluding gas)? 4. How long have you owned your home? 5. How soon are you looking to install a SunPower system? 6. Are you looking at other solar providers? 7. How did you hear about SunPower? 8. What is the best time to call you? 9. Who is your utility provider?
We appreciate your time and we hope that you decide that SunPower is the best choice for you.
If you need more information, please visit our website at www.sunpowercorp.com.
Thank you.
[CSR Name] SunPower Customer Care Team www.sunpowercorp.com 1-800-SUNPOWER
